settings.description:
A COMPREHENSIVE GUIDE TO THE DEFINING PIECES THAT COMPLETE YOUR WINTER WARDROBE

As the temperature dips and the layering begins, winter style starts to matter more. You want warmth without the bulk, function without forgetting polish. Whether it's the 9AM meeting or Saturday plans that run long, we've put together a winter essentials guide that works hard behind the scenes—so you don’t have to think twice about what to wear.

settings.heading: Knitwear
settings.text: Knitwear is a winter staple and an essential part of every man's wardrobe, offering a seamless blend of comfort, versatility, and effortless style whether worn alone as a separate piece, or layered for added interest or warmth. Be prepared for all occasions with a well-curated selection of knitwear options in various styles, weights and fabrications. Start with classic options like the crew and V-neck styles, adaptable pieces that transition from casual to more formal settings. Invest wisely in quality pieces made from long lasting materials such as our timeless merino wool turtleneck and luxurious cashmere long sleeved polo. For a more casual aesthetic opt for a stylish chunky 1/4 Zip knit, combining the practicality of a zip-up funnel neck, for style and functionality.

settings.heading: Leather Bags
settings.text: Crafted from premium pebbled leather, our quality range of bags combine sophistication and functionality, ensuring you’re sorted for all occasions. Step into the office with confidence with our Aldo Black Pebbled Leather Briefcase, it’s sleek design complete with ample storage space and compartments, have you covered. From your weekend road trips or overseas flights, travel in style with the Alessio Weekender Bag, with its spacious interior for all your travel essentials. With sturdy handles and a detachable shoulder strap, it's ready for any adventure!

settings.heading: Beanies
settings.text: Enjoy the comfort and practicality of our wool cashmere beanies. Keeping your head warm on those cold winter days, while injecting some personality and accessorising an otherwise plain outfit. Experiment with different fabric and textures for an added point of interest to your outfit.

settings.heading: Leather Footwear
settings.text: Step out this season in style and effortlessly transition between formal and casual settings, with our range of winter footwear, from durable boots to statement loafers. Enjoy the rustic charm of our durable wax leather Bucco Olive Chelsea Boots or the sleek profile of our modern Chelsea Boot. Benefit from the versatile lacing system and intricate detail offered by the Brogue Derby Boot styles. Add texture into your outfit with suede footwear, perfect for upgrading those more casual looks, from the comfortable and rugged style hiking boots to the rich autumnal allure of the cognac suede penny loafers.

settings.heading: Ties
settings.text: Ties remain a timeless essential for any gentleman's wardrobe providing that finishing touch to any formal outfit from dapper office attire to weddings and special events. Our handmade silk ties are crafted with some of the world's finest fabrics from Italy’s Como region. Cultivated, extracted and spun with artisanal expertise, these fabrics are dyed and woven into a stunning array of colours, patterns and texture. From subtle micro patterns and classic basketweaves to preppy stripes and bold medallions, our collection caters to every personality and occasion.

settings.heading: Leather Belts
settings.text: Buckle up in style from a sleek leather option for the office or a textured suede to see you through the weekend, a belt stands as a practical essential to complete your winter looks. When selecting the perfect belt, it is important to consider key details such as leather colour, texture, and metal hardware, as these are all factors in finding the correct pairing. Most importantly, start by matching the leather colour of your belt as closely as possible to that of your shoes; while they need not be an exact match, a close resemblance is preferred, especially for formal occasions. Additionally, consider coordinating the metal colour of the buckle with other hardware elements in your outfit, such as those on your shoes or briefcase, for a cohesive look.

settings.heading: Scarves
settings.text: Wrap yourself in luxury with our collection of beautifully crafted scarves, available in a pure silk that offers unparalleled softness and exquisite texture. Alternatively opt for a pure wool option, boasting exceptional warmth and softness. A scarf is a versatile accessory for both casual and formal wear, perfect for staying stylish and cozy during the cooler season.
